data.message: I can't believe he bowed down to another man like em is god r something respect lost. Not all the way but some respect lost for sure

replies.message: I hope he blows him and loses all your respect
I thought it was a funny reference to one of Eminem's nickname being Rap God. I think you're taking it to seriously
Not to serious. But bowing down how would you feel if your dad , boyfriend bowed down to one of his peers?
I like em nothing against him. Just come on let me find out your bowing down to another man

Because Drake cares about respect from you. This entire beef thing never happened. That was out of respect, I'm sure Eminem, or anybody would bow if 2pac all of a sudden came back.  Would you bow to fire fighters? Paramedics? People who are actual heroes? What if they saved your children or wife or mom? You bet your ass you'd bow down. Eminem is a hero to Drake, it's all about perspective.
You don't have to bow down to show respect.. Where the fuck do they do that shit come on man

You dont know shit about Rap your respect dont even matter even if drake looses it he did what he had to em is the best rapper alive the greatest man to have held the mic i respect drake for paying respect to em coz he is indeed a Rap god
You can pay respect in many ways but bowing down to another grown ass man... COME ON SERIOUSLY!!!!
Drake could've just gave him a hand shake or something 😂
Give Me a chance check this out
